import React, { useState } from "react"; import Button from "./Button"; import "../styles/modal.css" function Modal({titleModal, stateModal}){ const [userId, setUserId] = useState(''); const [title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [body, setBody] = useState(''); return(

{titleModal}

setUserId(e.target.value)} required >
setTitle(e.target.value)}>
